name: Mad BOXO!!
description:
Theme of the Game: Death is not the End.

Description: The player starts with 75% health. Collecting the health icon increases players health which makes him healthy thus the game gets over.

And collecting the spike icon takes the player to his death state but he doesn't die because "Death is not the End".

Objective: Having Full Health makes you lose. So do not collect health items even though if you do hit yourself with spikes to reduce your health.
